segments.text: I catch a glimpse of the boy stretching his body like a cat toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is so intense, it’s almost like he’s in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the wobbling stool beneath him, and my heart sinks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s indifference only adds to my dread; how can she not see?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipation heightens the moment; she’s practically glowing with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, all I can think about is the water spilling over the edges.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a beautiful day outside, with the garden looking pristine and perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, however, chaos reigns, and disaster seems imminent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If the boy falls, will he hit his head? Will anyone notice?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a simple moment, yet filled with so much tension - I can barely breathe.
segments.speaker: PAR
